attributes.action: seek a new mandate from the electorate to give us the chance to show how we feel about the expenses scandal.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The nation is appalled at the low ethical standards shown by many of its elected representatives with regards to their claims for public money. 
In any other arena these men and women would have faced disciplinary or even criminal action.
We wish to bring our representatives to account in the only way we can, through the ballot box.
Let the electorate judge their representatives.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
